title: Looking For These Signed Ty Cobb Cards
author: T206Collector

posts.post_title: Looking For These Signed Ty Cobb Cards
posts.post_content:
Do you know the whereabouts of any of these cards? If you can put me in touch with the owner of any of these cards, I'd be happy to reward you with baseball cards. E-mail [url]SignedT206@gmail.com[/url] if you have any helpful information. Thanks!
[URL="http://picasaweb.google.com/lh/photo/zq3DJOxx8WPP3VVXz2W-8g?authkey=Gv1sRgCPWtlfPx-KPY3QE&feat=embedwebsite"][IMG]http://lh4.ggpht.com/_Ys7fw31kTDs/Swb4jvVP2QI/AAAAAAAAHZY/xDMo5UYTTpo/s800/CobbScans.JPG[/IMG][/URL]
From [URL="http://picasaweb.google.com/pmifsud3d/MiscPreWar?authkey=Gv1sRgCPWtlfPx-KPY3QE&feat=embedwebsite"]Misc. Pre-War[/URL]
